+00002fd0: 6574 2041 5552 4f43 2042 6f6f 7473 7472  et AUROC Bootstr
+00002fe0: 6170 7065 6420 502d 5661 6c75 6520 746f  apped P-Value to
+00002ff0: 2043 6f6d 7061 7265 2054 776f 204d 6f64   Compare Two Mod
+00003000: 656c 730a 0a54 6869 7320 6d65 7468 6f64  els..This method

+00003030: 7477 6f20 6d6f 6465 6c73 2075 7369 6e67  two models using

+00003050: 5468 6520 6d65 7468 6f64 2063 616e 2062  The method can b

-000017c0: 6669 6361 6e74 2077 6179 2075 7369 6e67  ficant way using

+00001760: 2f61 3e20 546f 2073 756d 6d61 7269 7a65  /a> To summarize

+00001780: 206d 6574 686f 646f 6c6f 6779 2066 6f72   methodology for
+00001790: 2075 7369 6e67 2074 6865 2041 5552 4f43   using the AUROC
+000017a0: 2073 636f 7265 2074 6f20 7065 7266 6f72   score to perfor

+000017c0: 7473 2069 6e20 6f72 6465 7220 746f 2063  ts in order to c
+000017d0: 6f6d 7061 7265 206d 6f64 656c 7320 696e  ompare models in
+000017e0: 2061 2073 7461 7469 7374 6963 616c 6c79   a statistically
+000017f0: 2073 6967 6e69 6669 6361 6e74 2077 6179   significant way
+00001800: 2075 7369 6e67 2074 6865 205a 2d53 636f   using the Z-Sco
+00001810: 7265 2e0a 0a24 240a 5c74 6578 747b 5a7d  re...$$.\text{Z}
+00001820: 203d 205c 6672 6163 7b41 5543 5f31 202d   = \frac{AUC_1 -
+00001830: 2041 5543 5f32 7d7b 5c73 7172 747b 5c66   AUC_2}{\sqrt{\f
+00001840: 7261 637b 565f 3120 2b20 565f 3220 2d20  rac{V_1 + V_2 - 
+00001850: 3220 5c74 696d 6573 205c 7465 7874 7b43  2 \times \text{C

+00001870: 297d 7b32 7d7d 7d0a 2424 0a0a 4861 6e6c  )}{2}}}.$$..Hanl
+00001880: 6579 2061 6e64 204d 634e 6569 6c27 7320  ey and McNeil's 
+00001890: 6d65 7468 6f64 6f6c 6f67 7920 6861 7320  methodology has 
+000018a0: 7369 6e63 6520 6265 656e 2061 646f 7074  since been adopt

+00002db0: 2041 5552 4f43 2042 6f6f 7473 7472 6170   AUROC Bootstrap
+00002dc0: 7065 6420 502d 5661 6c75 6520 746f 2043  ped P-Value to C
+00002dd0: 6f6d 7061 7265 2054 776f 204d 6f64 656c  ompare Two Model
+00002de0: 730a 0a54 6869 7320 6d65 7468 6f64 2072  s..This method r

+00002fd0: 6574 2041 5552 4f43 2042 6f6f 7473 7472  et AUROC Bootstr
+00002fe0: 6170 7065 6420 502d 5661 6c75 6520 746f  apped P-Value to
+00002ff0: 2043 6f6d 7061 7265 2054 776f 204d 6f64   Compare Two Mod
+00003000: 656c 730a 0a54 6869 7320 6d65 7468 6f64  els..This method
+00003010: 2072 6574 7572 6e73 2061 2070 2d76 616c   returns a p-val
+00003020: 7565 2062 7920 636f 6d70 6172 696e 6720  ue by comparing 
+00003030: 7477 6f20 6d6f 6465 6c73 2075 7369 6e67  two models using
+00003040: 2062 6f6f 7473 7472 6170 7069 6e67 2e20   bootstrapping. 
+00003050: 5468 6520 6d65 7468 6f64 2063 616e 2062  The method can b
+00003060: 6520 7573 6564 2074 6f20 7065 7266 6f72  e used to perfor

+00003080: 2061 6e64 2074 776f 2d73 6964 6564 2068   and two-sided h

+00003240: 7473 2c20 6368 616e 6765 7320 7468 6520  ts, changes the

+00003260: 7468 6f64 6f6c 6f67 792c 2075 7365 7320  thodology, uses 
+00003270: 6469 6666 6572 6e74 2073 636f 7269 6e67  differnt scoring
+00003280: 2066 756e 6374 696f 6e61 6c69 7479 2c20   functionality,
